name: RecourseMerchant
content:
rule RecourseMerchant:
    getServiceDomain('Fullfilcreditcard')
    reportLog('editRecourseFlag', recourseCode)
    reportLog('editRecourseMrch', RecourseMerchantIdentifier)
    if trnmRecourseFlag != recourseCode or trnmRecourseMerchant != RecourseMerchantIdentifier
    then
        reportLog('nonMonChangedMe', 'Y'),
        updateServiceDomain('recourceCode', trnmRecourseFlag),
        reportLog('edit2RecourceFlag', trnmRecourseFlag),
        updateServiceDomain('recourseMerchantIdentifier', trnmRecourseMerchant),
        reportLog('edit2RecourseMerc', trnmRecourseMerchant)
    endif
